subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: A crisis strikes the heart of basketball country: For the first time in nearly a decade, none of Indiana’s Division I men’s teams have made the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: A crisis strikes the heart of basketball country: For the first time in nearly a decade, none of Indiana’s Division I men’s teams have made the N.C.A.A. tournament.
